about_the_game:
On Halloween night an arrogant demon takes over the small town of Sodaton and claims it as his "Shadow Hold"! Embark on an insane journey set in the 1980's with three zany teenagers as they brave the danger's of demonic assault and eerie changes to the world around them to defeat this creature and save their home. Enjoy local three player couch coop Action Adventure RPG with leveling, spells, and unique death and damage mechanics taking place with a campy horror theme inspired by the SNES Action JRPG's of yore!

Local Co-Op Action RPG Goodness!

Grab a controller and spare two more for a couple of friends to enjoy three player local co-op!

Multi-Dimensional Travel!

Explore six unique dimensional environments and take on a variety of possessed objects, demons, and twisted mythical creatures as you travel dimensions to liberate them from the demon Aston's control. (And gain their power in the process!)

[Alchemy Spell Power![/b]

Leverage the change in the worlds laws and craft powerful alchemy formula's to burn, freeze, crush, pierce, or other wise completely obliterate your foes! Gain new alchemy formula as you explore new worlds and leverage them against your foes!

Death Is Not The End!

Oh no! You've suffered death dealing damage! Not quite yet. As the demon lord's power has tainted your world, the forces of the universe push back! Your characters are all blessed with unique alternate forms called "Guardian Forms"! Gain a new line of abilities in lieu of your current combat options, and help your party members revive your favorite character for a limited amount of time!

Play Us. If Not for Us Then for The Doggo

Marcus' trusty pup Allie demands you play. Because boof.

short_description: Shadow Hold is a 2D coop action adventure rpg where you will fight spirits, the undead, and hell itself. Adventure through haunting and zany environments that blend the normal and ethereal while defending your party and eliminating the demonic threat.
